headerText: This is the spiel for the header

posts.anecdote: I've spent some time in the games industry as a full-stack web systems engineer, provided consultancy and design work for charity initiatives, and assisted research projects in maintenance and data organisation.

content.text:
This is a bit where I pander to a specific demographic - perhaps there's a header, perhaps I'm simply talking about something that bears relevance to the above or below. Whatever the case, it's intended to give a more personable insight into what I'm doing. Perhaps it simply states my current employment and what I'm seeking.

There should be a break, as I'm wont to avoid paragraphs despite my experience typesetting.

posts.anecdote: I've spoken at conferences, and I represent my degree discipline in ambassadorship and outreach teaching activities. I also do freelance photography!

content.text:
I make mistakes

So I'm documenting them on my blog in order to learn from them. Most of the peskier ones end up being pretty useful. As I do work, I've been writing anecdotal posts that log my experiences wrestling with new and exciting problems; I also have recurring series'. Whether you came wearing your design, programming or business hat, I think you'll find something useful.

I'm currently reading 'Deep Learning' by Ian Goodfellow
